attributes.title: Tim's Cascade Chips
attributes.description:
Created on November 22, 2010 by NateFord on Sourcemap.org:

This map shows where ingredients in a bag of Tim's regular potato chips come from. Independent distributors deliver their product to major chain stores and many convenience stores throughout 11 western states, Alaska, Hawaii and Canada. They buy their salt and vegetable oil from major refineries in the United States.
